posts.post_title: FS: 1910 T212 Obak Larry Jansen PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Greetings! Offered for sale is a 1910 T212 Obak Larry Jansen (175 Subjects) PSA 4. Great color on this one! Asking $65.00 (shipping included), tracking and insurance is extra. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking.
Jeff

Last price drop, $65.00 shipped on this nice Obak!
